answers.author: Timothy McLean
answers.text:
I liked this survey. One major point you may want to emphasize in your research is how difficult it is to break into the world of local government. Many communities no longer have an Assistant to the City Manager or offer paid internship programs. Positions like mine seem to be dying out. And we all know how very competitive this profession can be.

author: Jessie Levine
text:
I am an ICMA member working on my master's in public administration, with a capstone project focusing on the aging of our profession and how to attract/retain new professionals. I have developed a survey targeted at managers or others in public administration with fewer than 10 years experience, and I hope that readers in that category could take the time to take the completely anonymous (and not invasive) survey. The link is below.
http://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/1760279/Capstone-Survey-to-Young-Managers
And please feel free to pass on the link to others who may not see this message on Knowledge Network.
Many thanks!
Jessie Levine
title: MPA Capstone Survey for Young Professionals
